lead_paragraph: COACH In Italy, José Mourinho is expected to replace Roberto Mancini as the coach of Inter Milan. Inter is on track to win the title in Serie A and Mancini has said he planned to step down. Mourinho, 45, who was dismissed by Chelsea last September, is likely to try and lure his former players Didier Drogba and Frank Lampard to Italy.
